title: Rahu Transit in the 6th House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When Rahu transits the 6th house for Scorpio Ascendant, focus sharpens on competition, problem-solving, and overcoming obstacles through unconventional methods. This phase boosts the drive to defeat rivals, manage conflicts, and push through demanding work environments. Health routines may fluctuate, requiring mindful discipline. You may feel compelled to take shortcuts, but ethical clarity is crucial. When effort is structured and intentions remain clean, this transit empowers victory over challenges, strengthens resilience, and improves practical control over daily struggles.

sections.title: Career
points: Success in service or crisis roles

sections.title: Finance
points: Expenses linked to work or health

closing: This Rahu transit channels intensity into problem-solving and victory. With ethical discipline, it turns challenges into clear wins and lasting strength.
